review: I found Dr. Mangala Gowri while searching on Google for fertility doctors. Chose  her after seeing her rating. And we are so so so happy to have chosen her. We felt immediately comfortable with her and I admire that she was never after money. She genuinely explained my case very straight forward. We truly felt valued with her honest opinions.  First round of IVF was successful and we are blessed with a baby girl. She ** **** ************* *** studies the case thoroughly and doesnâ€™t fritter away your time or hers. I really really thank Dr. Mangala Gowri for replying to all my msgs during the treatment and pregnancy and her complete guidance. She is one genuine doctor we canâ€™t find everywhere. *** ** *** ** ** *** ****** *** ***** **** *****

review: I really had a good experience. @Magala Gowri is the best. She will explain you about every treatment that she provides.Any medicine she gives, she will explain me about its side effects. Reception people are also very helpful. They will also arrange for urgent appointment if needed.Overall Magala Gowri really helped me.Thank you so much ðŸ™‚
